SEARCH
Package Model

Class Room

java.lang.Object
Model.Room
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeluxeRoom, ExecutiveRoom, StandardRoom
public abstract class Room extends Object

The Room class represents a room in a hotel, containing details about its name, reservations, availability status, room price, and methods to manage reservations.

Version:
4.4
Author:
Jusper Angelo Cesar

      Parameters:

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable(int checkInDay, int checkOutDay)
      Checks if the room is available for booking during the specified period.
      Parameters:
      checkInDay - The day of check-in.
      checkOutDay - The day of check-out.
      Returns:
      true if the room is available, false otherwise.

    • getAvailability

      public boolean[] getAvailability()
      Generates an array representing the room's availability for each day of the month.
      Returns:
      A boolean array where each element indicates the availability of the room for a specific day. The array has 31 elements, corresponding to days 1 through 31. A value of true means the room is available on that day, and false means the room is booked.

    • getRoomBaseRate

      public double getRoomBaseRate()
      Retrieves the price per night for the room.
      Returns:
      The price per night for the room.

    • setRoomPrice

      public void setRoomPrice(double roomPrice)
      Sets the price per night for the room.
      Parameters:
      roomPrice - the room price to set to.

    • getReservation

      public Reservation getReservation(int i)
      Retrieves the reservation at the specified index from the list of reservations.
      Parameters:
      i - The index of the reservation in the list.
      Returns:
      The Reservation object at the specified index.

    • isBooked

      public boolean isBooked()
      Checks if the room is currently booked.
      Returns:
      true if there are one or more reservations for the room, indicating it is booked; false otherwise.

    • getReservationSize

      public int getReservationSize()
      Retrieves the number of reservations associated with the room.
      Returns:
      The number of reservations associated with the room.

      Retrieves the name or identifier of the room.
      Returns:

    • getRoomType

      public abstract String getRoomType()
      Returns the type of the room as a string. This is an abstract method
      Returns:
      the room type
